title: I have never evaded income tax: 'Puli' actor Vijay clears the air
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 07, 2015, 12.58 pm Mumbai: 'Puli' star Vijay has denied allegations of tax evasion after the Income Tax Department officials raided his house along with other prominent film personalities a day before the release of his film. The actor released a statement regarding the income tax raid that took place last week.
In a statement to media, Ilayathalapathy Vijay said, “Income tax sleuths carrying out searches in the homes and offices of notable personalities is a long-followed, natural practice. Last week, a raid was carried out at my office and home to probe whether I have evaded tax. My family members and staff cooperated and presented all the documents of my income tax returns. I have been religiously paying income tax on all my assets till this very financial year.”
Read: Income tax department raid houses of Tamil actors Vijay and Nayanthara The actor expressed sadness and also rubbished media reports that stated he had evaded income tax.
